comments:
I am using 3.2RC2 and I get sporadically the below exception with the Snippet210 sample on drag and drop.  Basically, I highlight a piece of text on the left side and drag and drop on the right side.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Argument not valid
